title: Maharani Emerald & Diamond Grand Haaram - COHar00028
materials: vibrant green color). Accented with small rubies
features: Elaborate floral and paisley (manga malai) inspired design with intricate diamond setting. Central pendant features a large emerald surrounded by a halo of diamonds and ruby accents.. The Haaram is adorned with delicate heart-shaped diamond pendants, echoing traditional South Indian aesthetics with a contemporary feel. The intricate filigree and openwork contribute to a grand yet graceful appeal.
colors: complemented by the rich green of the emeralds and subtle red rubies.
occasions: or special occasions where a statement of elegance and tradition is desired. Perfect for Muhurtham (ముహూర్తం)
description: This Grand Haaram is a masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship. The combination of high-quality diamonds and vibrant emeralds creates a mesmerizing effect. Its timeless design ensures it will be treasured for generations. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a lasting sheen and antique charm. The meticulous diamond setting highlights the brilliance of each stone, making it a true statement piece.
